desc: Reoccuring once a year. To refer to a specific year, use the `year` datatype
Reoccuring once a quarter. To refer to a specific quarter, use periods/quarters
Reoccuring once a month. To refer to a specific month, use periods/months
Reoccuring once a week To refer to a specific week, use the `week` datatype
Rolling three month periods, for example Feb-Apr
Rolling 12 month periods, for example Feb-Jan
A school year that typically runs over two calendar years
A (school) semester. May vary in length and starting point
